column4: my volume randomly resets to 0 and mutes, and I cannot set it back unless I reboot? any idea why, and/or any ideas on how to fix?
does syslog / dmesg show an error sounds like pun intended module unloading
am I looking for something in particular? "audio" "sound" and "speaker" is not found when running dmesg
could be cryptic post your dmesg output to pastebin
http://pastebin.ubuntu.com/1171994/
see the line PME# d1 d2 ect repeating .. thats your error message i bet
the webcam is throwing errors also it seems its a external usb one ?
really? I don't have a USB webcam
any idea on how to fix the audio error?
can you unplug the webcam ?
i see nevermind
pastebin output from lspci
actually, I never tried using it much, but I'm kinda thinking the webcam doesn't even work
looking at the error messages im pretty sure it wont
http://pastebin.ubuntu.com/1172022/
check this out http://ubuntuforums.org/showpost.php?p=5131958&postcount=2
/etc/modprobe.d/alsa-base is blank. normal?
you need to add that line into there
options snd-hda-intel model=hp
there are like 8 options for various hp models.. so it may be one of the other ones might have to guess if your not sure
should I login again now or restart?
reboot
